It was thought the American job was a done deal but it seems the US executives have had a last-minute change of heart. They are now questioning whether she's famous enough in America. Sergio Marchionne said Chrysler remains grateful for the bailouts and noted that no other parties were willing to assist in Chrysler's recovery. The two governments levied interest rates that, although appropriate at the time, are above current market conditions, he continued.`` This was done with the full support and understanding of the members of Chrysler Group LLC.''
